meanings.definition: Heathenisms: beliefs or practices of heathens
meanings.sent1: The heathenisms of ancient tribes involved worshipping multiple gods.
meanings.sent2: She studied different heathenisms to understand their rituals.
meanings.sent3: The heathenisms of the lost civilization were quite fascinating.
meanings.sent4: In the land of heathenisms, traditions clashed and merged like colorful ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The heathenisms of the nomadic people were as diverse as the stars in the sky.

meanings.definition: Heathenisms: the state of being a heathen
meanings.sent1: The village was wary of outsiders, fearing their heathenisms.
meanings.sent2: His heathenisms were evident in his refusal to attend church.
meanings.sent3: The heathenisms of the mischievous child made the neighbors chuckle.
meanings.sent4: She felt trapped in the suffocating embrace of her own heathenisms.
meanings.sent5: The heathenisms of the old sailor were as vast as the ocean he sailed.
